name: Spoločnosť ochrany spotrebiteľov
goal: We are Slovak consumer organisation. Our main mission is to inform, represent, enforce and advocate for consumers rights on especially national level.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives: directives concerning consumer protection (unfair commercial practices, digital, energy, renewables, telecom, competition and financial services), personnel data protection, dual quality and food and collective redress
